Description: Primary key identifier for the organization

Sample Values: Non-profit organization dedicated to eliminating poverty through innovative methodologies

Description: Indicates if the organization is currently active

Data Quality Checks: Valid Unix timestamp, Not in future

Description: Country where the organization is located
Data Quality Checks: ISO country code format, Length check (2)
Enumeration check (NGO, BUSINESS, GOVERNMENT, ACADEMIC, OTHER)
URL format check, Image domain validation

Description: Contact phone number for the organization
Data Quality Checks: Phone number format check, Length check (max 50)

Description: Reference to the parent organization (if any)
Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.organizations

Description: Latitude coordinate of the organization's location
Longitude coordinate of the organization's location
User who last modified the record
Timestamp when the record was created

Data Quality Checks: Valid timestamp, Not in future, >= created_date
